meanings.definition: A god or deity in Hinduism.
meanings.sent1: The devas were worshipped in the temple.
meanings.sent2: In Hinduism, people believe in many devas.
meanings.sent3: The devas had a meeting to discuss the upcoming monsoon season.
meanings.sent4: The devas' power was as mighty as the roaring thunderstorm.
meanings.sent5: The devas' presence filled the air with divine energy.

meanings.sent1: Buddhists offer prayers to the devas for guidance.
meanings.sent2: The devas are said to reside in heavenly realms.
meanings.sent3: One day, a deva decided to try human food and found it delightful.
meanings.sent4: The devas' light shone brighter than any star in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The devas' peaceful aura enveloped the meditating monk.

meanings.definition: An angel or supernatural being in various mythologies.
meanings.sent1: Legends speak of devas protecting the forests from harm.
meanings.sent2: In Greek mythology, devas are akin to the messengers of the gods.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous devas played pranks on unsuspecting travelers.
meanings.sent4: The devas' wings glimmered with an otherworldly iridescence.
meanings.sent5: The devas' beauty was beyond mortal comprehension.
